verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
Down from His glory
Ever living story
My God and Savior came
And Jesus was His name

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Born in a manger
To His own a stranger
A Man of sorrows
tears and agony

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
O how I love Him
How I adore Him
My breath my sunshine
My all in all

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
The great Creator
Became my Savior
And all God's fullness
Dwelleth in Him

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
What condescension
Bringing us redemption
That in the dead of night
Not one faint hope in sight

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
God gracious tender
Laid aside His splendor
Stooping to woo to win
To save my soul

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Without reluctance
Flesh and blood His substance
He took the form of man
Revealed the hidden plan

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
O glorious myst'ry
Sacrifice of Calv'ry
And now I know Thou art
The great I AM
